name: James Howlett
text: Setup: Search your deck, hand and discard pile for Wolverine's Claws and put it into play under your control. Healing Factor — Action: Remove 1 wound counter from the Old and Tired upgrade. (Limit once per round.)

errata: MC4DB : Traits have been changed from "Mutant. X-Man" to "X-Men"
flavor: "Every time I start to think things won't go bad."
name: Old Man Logan
text: Berserker — Action: Place 1 wound counter on the Old and Tired upgrade. Old Man Logan gets +1 THW, +1 ATK and +1 DEF until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

name: Old and Tired
text:
Permanent. Setup.
You get -1 hit point for each wound counter here.
While there are 6 or more wound counters here, you get +1 hand size.

name: Wolverine's Claws
text: Interrupt: When you attack, exhaust Wolverine's Claws → increase the damage that attack deals by 1 for each wound counter on Old and Tired (max 3 increase in damage). This attack gains piercing. Place 1 wound counter on Old and Tired.

flavor: "I let myself become chaos. Madness. Death." — Old Man Logan
name: Blind Rage
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Blind Rage → Place 1 wound counter on Old and Tired. Generate a [wild] resource.

name: Adamantium Skeleton
text: Old Man Logan gets +1 DEF. Interrupt: When a wound counter would be placed on Old and Tired, exhaust Adamantium Skeleton instead.

flavor: "This is what old is. Confusion, aches and pains." — Old Man Logan
name: Enhanced Healing Factor
text: Interrupt: When you would be defeated, remove each wound counter from Old and Tired instead. Then, discard Enhanced Healing Factor.

name: Old Man Hawkeye
text: Old Man Hawkeye enters play with 2 arrow counters on him. Response: After a minion engages you, remove 1 arrow counter from Old Man Hawkeye → deal 4 damage to that minion.

name: Savage Stab
text: Hero Action (attack): Place 1 wound counter on Old and Tired. Deal 3 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, ready Wolverine's Claws.

name: Unfazed
text: Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent 1 of that damage for each wound counter on Old and Tired. Place 1 wound counter on Old and Tired.

name: Vicious Animal
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy for each wound counter on Old and Tired (max 8 damage). You may divide the damage dealt by this attack among enemies as you choose. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, you may place a wound counter on Old and Tired.

name: Skilled Tracker
text: Action (thwart): Remove 1 threat from a scheme for each wound counter on Old and Tired (max 4 threat). If you paid for this card using a [mental] resource, you may remove a wound counter from Old and Tired.
